plan.summary: A 2-day nature exploration trip from San Francisco to Los Angeles

morning.name: Hike at Griffith Park
morning.description: Enjoy the panoramic views of LA from the top

afternoon.name: Visit Santa Monica Pier
afternoon.description: Stroll along the pier and enjoy the ocean breeze

evening.name: Dinner at Cliff's Edge
evening.description: Dine in a charming outdoor patio surrounded by greenery

morning.name: Explore Malibu Creek State Park
morning.description: Hike through the stunning canyons and creeks

afternoon.name: Visit El Matador Beach
afternoon.description: Relax on the beautiful beach surrounded by cliffs

evening.name: Dinner at Inn of the Seventh Ray
evening.description: Dine in a enchanting garden setting under twinkling lights
evening.location: Inn of the Seventh Ray, Topanga

tips: Carry a water bottle during outdoor activities
